# representativeItem

**Instance Property**

A media item whose properties are representative of the other media items in a collection.

## Declaration

```swift
var representativeItem: MPMediaItem? { get }
```

## Discussion

The media items in a collection typically share common property values, owing to how you built the collection. For example, if you build a collection based on a predicate that uses the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaItemPropertyArtist] property, all items in the collection share the same artist name. You can use the `representativeItem` property to efficiently obtain values for such common properties—often more efficiently than fetching an item from the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaItemCollection/items] array.

## Using a media item collection

- **items**: The media items in a media item collection.
- **count**: The number of media items in a collection.
- **mediaTypes**: The types of the media items in a collection.
